channel.title: Patrick Bollenbach - Shopify Expert Web Developer
channel.description: Recent content on Patrick Bollenbach - Shopify Expert Web Developer

item.title: Contact
item.description: Send me a message using the form below and I’ll try to get back to you within 48 hours. Your Name Email Address An email address is required. Message

item.title: About
item.description: I’ve been a freelance Shopify developer for 3 years now, working with international clients both big and small. Graduating from Conestoga College in Canada, I’ve taken my programming chops and travelled around the world while working remotely. I’m currently looking for on-going Shopify dev work for agencies looking to get into the e-commerce world. Send me a message if you’ve got an interesting project or if you just want to chat!
